node.category: What is the way things are?
Should penalties for dog dirt be higher?

node.surface: Higher penalties for dog dirt are pointless

node.category: What makes higher penalties for dog dirt pointless?

node.surface: as long as there is not enough personnel to enforce them.

node.category: Are higher penalties pointless in all cases?

node.surface: In individual cases they may indeed act as a deterrent,
in general, however, a clean environment and the role model effect of others is more likely to motivate the dog owner to pick up the droppings than a potential fine.
